entry.source: {F812}Youthful man\0{F87A,81}{F813,1,403402}Before the ceiling appeared, Shibuya{F801}was filled with young guys.{F801}{F802}But then after that, it was crowded{F801}with demons who want Reds...{F801}{F802}Though since that demon moved in,{F801}things have quieted down...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Youthful man\0{F87A,81}{F813,1,403403}There's a rumor that demons are pouring{F801}out from a reactor in Ichigaya...{F801}{F802}We need electricity, so the reactor{F801}is a must-have.{F801}{F802}In a way, Tokyo never was completely{F801}free from the threat of demons...{F801}
